intro: The Cthonian Headhunters (CXLII CoH) follow the Feral Pattern Doctrine, with an emphasis on fierce close combat. Its armies gain 13 formation points (F/p), 14 upgrade points (U/p), 4 Titan points (T/p), and 4 Ally points (A/p) for a normal sized battle. A negative U/p value means that you gain that many upgrade points for taking a particular formation.
strategy: Solar Auxilia armies have a Strategy Rating of 2.
Initiative: Legiones Astartes Allied Detachments and Collegia Titanica Allied Banners have an Initiative Rating of 1+. Cthonian Headhunter Sections have an Initiative Rating of 2+, and are subject to the 'A Lean Race of Killers' special rule. Legio Cybernetica Maniples have an initiative of 2+ and are subject to the 'Cybernetica Cortex' special rule. Imperial Militia Platoons have an initiative of 2+ and are subject to the 'Feral Warriors' special rule.

formations.name: 1 Section Command Tercio
formations.units: One Auxilia Legate Marshal character in an Auxilia Command Squad, four Auxilia Lasrifle Squads, and one Auxilia Flamer Squad
extraUnits: Replace four Auxilia Lasrifle Squads with four Auxilia Feral Squads (Free)
Add three Aurox of any single configuration: 1 U/p
Add two Cyclops of any single configuration: 1 U/p

formations.name: 1+ Auxilia Lasrifle Tercio
formations.units: One Auxilia Captain in an Auxilia Command Squad, four Auxilia Lasrifle Squads, one Auxilia Flamer Squad
extraUnits: Replace four Auxilia Lasrifle Squads with four Auxilia Feral Squads (Free)
Add three Aurox of any single configuration: 1 U/p
Add two Cyclops of any single configuration: 1 U/p

sections.name: Cthonian Headhunters Special Sections
sections.description: May only have one Special Section for each Core Section

formations.name: Auxilia Dracosan Section
formations.units: One Auxilia Command Squad with an Auxilia Captain, three Auxilia Lasrifle Squads, one Dracosan - Lascannon
extraUnits: Replace three Auxilia Lasrifle Squads with three Auxilia Feral Squads (Free)
Replace one Dracosan Lascannon with two Dracosan - Demolisher (2 U/p)

formations.name: Auxilia Malcador Squadron
formations.units: Two Malcadors of any single configuration

formations.name: Heavy Malcador Squadron
formations.units: Two Heavy Malcador Infernus, or two Heavy Malcador Valdor

formations.name: Auxilia Artillery Battery
extraUnits: Add one Basilisk and/or Medusa: 1 U/p

sections.name: Cthonian Headhunters Elite Sections
sections.description: May only have one Elite Section for each two Core or Special Sections

formations.name: Auxilia Heavy Sentinel Patrol
extraUnits: Add one Auxilia Adjutant character to one unit in the formation: 1 U/p

formations.name: Auxilia Rapier Battery
extraUnits: Replace four Rapier Laser Destroyer with four Rapier Quad Launchers or four Rapier Mole Mortars: 1 U/p
Add up to two Tarantulas of any configuration: 1 U/p each
Add one Auxilia Adjutant character to one unit in the formation: 1 U/p

formations.name: Super-Heavy Tank Squadron
extraUnits: Replace the Baneblade with a Hellhammer, Stormblade, or Stormsword (Free), or a Shadowsword (1 U/p)
Add one Auxilia Adjutant character to one unit in the formation: 1 U/p

formations.name: Auxilia Leman Russ Company
formations.units: One Auxilia Adjutant character, eight Leman Russ of any configuration

formations.name: Auxilia Artillery Company
formations.units: One Auxilia Adjutant character, eight Basilisk and/or Medusa

sections.name: Imperial Navy Squadrons
sections.description: May only have one Navy Squadron for each two Core or Special Sections

formations.name: Thunderbolt Squadron
extraUnits: Add up to two Thunderbolt Fighters: 1 U/p each

formations.name: Warhound
extraUnits: Replace one Battle Weapon with a Support Weapon: 1 U/p

formations.name: Warhound Pack
formations.units: Two Warhound Scout Titans (must have the same armament)
extraUnits: Replace one Battle Weapon with a Support Weapon: 2 U/p

formations.name: Reaver
extraUnits: Replace one Battle Weapon with a Support Weapon (1 U/p) or Heavy Support Weapon (2 U/p).

formations.name: Warlord
extraUnits: Replace one Battle Weapon with a Support Weapon (1 U/p) or Heavy Support Weapon (2 U/p).

formations.name: Warmaster
extraUnits: Replace two Battle Weapons with two Support Weapons of the same type (1 U/p)

sections.name: Allies: Legiones Astartes Detachments
sections.description: The first formation selected must be a Tactical Detachment

formations.name: Tactical Detachment
formations.units: One Lieutenant character, four Tactical Legionaries
extraUnits: Replace up to two Legion Tactical Squads with two Legion Support Squads (1 U/p), two Legion Heavy Support Squads (2 U/p), or two Contemptor Dreadnoughts of any single configuration (2 U/p)

formations.name: Land Speeder Detachment
formations.units: Three Proteus Land Speeders or Javelin Attack Speeders of any configuration
extraUnits: Add one Proteus Land Speeder or Javelin Attack Speeder of any configuration: 1 U/p

sections.name: Allies: Taghmata Omnissah Maniples
sections.description: The first formation selected must be an Adsecularis Maniple

formations.name: Adsecularis Maniple
formations.units: One Tech-Priest Auxilia, five Adsecularis Tech-Thrall Cohorts
extraUnits: Add up to two Vorax Battle-Automata Cohorts: 1 U/p each
Add two Myrmidon Secutor Hosts: 2 U/p

formations.name: Thallax Maniple
extraUnits: Add up to two Ursarax Cohorts: 1 U/p each
Add up to two Vorax Battle-Automata Cohorts: 1 U/p each

formations.name: Myridon Maniple
extraUnits: Add up to two Arlatax Battle-Automata: 1 U/p each
